name: Samantha Lee
persona: Samantha Lee is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.16. She is moderately conscientious and disciplined, often setting realistic but ambitious grade goals for herself. While she sometimes experiences test anxiety, her perseverance and self-efficacy help her push through challenges. Samantha is motivated by her interest in science and is committed to improving her academic performance each semester.
